web_snippets: Catherine Taft is a fellow of CCL Class of 2021. ... Catherine Taft is the curator and deputy director of LAXART,a non-profit exhibition space in Los Angeles.
Catherine Taft. Deputy Director & Curator at The Brick. ArtCenter College of Design. Los Angeles, California, United States.
Catherine Taft is a curator, writer, and deputy director of the Los Angeles–based nonprofit LAXART. She is a regular contributor to Artforum magazine.
